comment: Jim Acosta is acting very emotional & he's extremely fixated on Trump. Jim's proven he's willing to say things that he knows are false in order to hurt him. Now, he's running around acting like he's in danger. His job puts him close to Trump. Could this emotional, malicious & damaged man decide to "act" on these perceived threats? He should be kept away.
